response.original_title: End of school day at coeducational school
response.overview: A factual film in which exuberant boys and girls, apparently high school students, walk through the arches of a school building and down the steps. Most of the boys wear caps and most of the girls wear fancy hats and ankle-length or mid-calf length full skirts; many of the students carry books. Two men attired in robes appear. Possibly a scene of graduation day or the last day of school.
response.title: End of school day at coeducational school

titles.title: Graduation day in a coeducational school
